Parameters: ParcelFileDescriptor: The pipe where data should be written. This will be closed for you upon returning from this function. This value must never be null.
Uri: The URI whose data is to be written. This value must never be null.
String: The desired type of data to be written. This value must never be null.
Bundle: Options supplied by caller. This value may be null.
T: Your own custom arguments. This value may be null.
writeDataToPipe(android.os.ParcelFileDes.Description: Called from a background thread to stream data out to a pipe. Note that the pipe is blocking, so this thread can block on writes for an arbitrary amount of time if the client is slow at reading.
writeDataToPipe(android.os.ParcelFileDes.FullName: public abstract void writeDataToPipe (ParcelFileDescriptor output, Uri uri, String mimeType, Bundle opts, T args)

ClassDesc: Interface to write a stream of data to a pipe. Use with @B_android#content#ContentProvider#openPipeHelper_E@.
